When Thulsa catches especially powerful heroes, he traps them in immortal bodies and binds their wills in soultrap shards.

Cut down tower generals, general's escorts, tower decurions, and zombies in Ebon Tower and bring back those shards.

Some of these souls have been forced to serve Thulsa for centuries.

I'll give the shards to our master smiths, who'll feed them into the heart of the Divine Furnace.

The spirits of these fallen heroes will finally be laid to rest with the honor they deserve.
Every one of those horrors was a hero. Destroy them so we can free them.
